summary: Alain has well-rounded technical skills relevant to his experience as a product leader.
He has expertise in product strategy, roadmap development, agile methodologies, and stakeholder engagement.
His work experience spans various industries and roles, demonstrating adaptability and ability to learn quickly.

skills.name: Agile Methodologies
skills.description: Alain has experience with agile methodologies, including Lean and User-Centered Design.

skills.name: Lean Practices
skills.description: He has knowledge of lean practices and has applied them in his work.

skills.name: Product Strategy and Roadmap Development
skills.description: Alain has expertise in product strategy and roadmap development, having guided product development teams and driven consensus on product roadmaps.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: He has experience with stakeholder engagement, including client relations and user feedback integration.

experience.title: Head of Digital Transformation at International Disability Alliance (Non-Profit)
experience.description: Alain led technological initiatives that optimized operational conduct in a remote team with high accessibility requirements.
achievements: Migrated the organization to Microsoft Office

experience.title: Product Manager at Cenareo
experience.description: Alain built and led the product function, shifting focus from SMBs to Enterprise clients and addressing larger client challenges.
achievements: Monitored product metrics using Jupyter and Pandas

experience.title: Senior Product Manager at Pivotal (Consulting)
experience.description: Alain supported product initiatives with major corporations and mentored client Product Managers.
achievements: Applied lean practices and user-centered design

education.institution: George Mason University School of Management
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems and Operations Management
